attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the  debacle of the Gurka vote in the commons yesterday, and the general mishandling of this nation over the past 2 years,we the undersigned call for the immediate resignation of Prime Minister Gordon Brown, and call for an immediate vote of confidence in his Government and the calling of a general election within the next 3 months

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
